citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection
process at 9:30 am on 02/23/2015. The licensee was contacted by phone and is out of town for the day.
Additional Inspectors
Bacon Robert, Animal Care Inspector
